publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2913 Mr Brian Monteith: Skill Force Pilot Scheme-That the Parliament welcomes the early success of the pilot scheme "Skill Force" being undertaken in schools in North Lanarkshire in conjunction with retired armed forces instructors; notes the increased attainment and improving attendance and attitude of pupils within the pilot who were previously disengaged from the education system; further notes that the pilot has also been welcomed by pupils themselves, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to give further freedom to Scotland's schools to introduce local initiatives to inspire those pupils to benefit from education who are disengaged from the standardised academic approach.

S1M-2913 Mr Brian Monteith: Skill Force Pilot Scheme—That the Parliament welcomes the early success of the pilot scheme "Skill Force" being undertaken in schools in North Lanarkshire in conjunction with retired armed forces instructors; notes the increased attainment and improving attendance and attitude of pupils within the pilot who were previously disengaged from the education system; further notes that the pilot has also been welcomed by pupils themselves, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to give further freedom to Scotland’s schools to introduce local initiatives to inspire those pupils to benefit from education who are disengaged from the standardised academic approach.
